mapper.insert: insert into carts(memberId, productId, cartAmount, inventoryId) values(#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{cartAmount}, #{inventoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id,c.member_id,c.product_id,c.cart_amount,c.inventory_id, p.product_name,p.price,p.discount_price,p.detail, i.PRODUCT_COLOR, i.PRODUCT_size FROM carts c JOIN products p ON c.product_id = p.product_id join inventories i on c.inventory_id = i.inventory_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}

select count(distinct c.inventory_id) as totalKind, sum(cart_amount) as totalCount, sum(p.price*cart_amount) as totalPrice from carts c join products p on c.product_id = p.product_id join inventories i on c.inventory_id = i.inventory_id where member_id = #{memberId}
